command.source: SELECT CLIN_CLNT_NB, PCS_SYS_ID_NB, CPA_RPT_CLNT_NB, CLNT_NME, AKA_NME, HLTH_INDS_NB, CLNT_AFIL_CD, LAST_CHG_ID_NB, LAST_CHG_TS, MODEL_TYP_CD, BUS_TYP_CD, AP_VEND_ID, AP_CO_ID, PMT_SCHD_CD , PMT_TM_VL, PMT_TYPE_CD, ADDR_LINE1_TXT, ADDR_LINE2_TXT, CITY_NM, ST_CD, PSTL_CD, CR_HOLD_CD, SAP_PAY_TYPE_CD, CPA_CLM_PRCS_CD, RBAT_CLM_TYPE_CD ,MAIL_AT_RETAIL, RBEL_CLNT_CD, PMT_SYS_ELIG_CD FROM ${dmt_schema}.kscc002_client order by 1, 2, 3
command.target: INSERT INTO ${pmt_schema}.kscc002_client ( CLIN_CLNT_NB, PCS_SYS_ID_NB, CPA_RPT_CLNT_NB, CLNT_NME, AKA_NME, HLTH_INDS_NB, CLNT_AFIL_CD, LAST_CHG_ID_NB, LAST_CHG_TS, MODEL_TYP_CD, BUS_TYP_CD, AP_VEND_ID, AP_CO_ID, PMT_SCHD_CD , PMT_TM_VL, PMT_TYPE_CD, ADDR_LINE1_TXT, ADDR_LINE2_TXT, CITY_NM, ST_CD, PSTL_CD, CR_HOLD_CD, SAP_PAY_TYPE_CD , CPA_CLM_PRCS_CD, RBAT_CLM_TYPE_CD, MAIL_RTL_PRC_QTY, RBEL_CLNT_CD, PMT_SYS_ELIG_CD ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,? )

catch.command:
[ERROR] MF REFRESH KSCC002

#if (${system.getProperty('logfile')}) #end
Host:${localhost}
Started:${startTime}
Script:${scriptName}
Log File: ${system.getProperty('logfile')}


#if (${script.getLastStatement()})

Last Statement

${script.getLastStatement()}

#end

Stack Trace

${stackTrace}
